conbody.p: The Management Console is the web interface of .
When the server finishes the start-up process, the hypervisor's tty console displays the URL of the Management Console. Enter this URL into your web browser.
conbody.note:
The SSL certificate for the Management Console is self-signed. You will need to manually accept this certificate in your browser. For information on using your own certificate, see HTTPS.
When the Management Console loads, you will be prompted to create the first administrator and the first organization for the system. Enter a username (your email address) and a password, read and accept the Terms of Use Agreeement, and click Complete Setup.This element is single-sourced.
conbody.p: After creating the first administrator, you can use these account credentials to create additional users, organizations, and spaces, push applications, and configure the system using the Management Console.This element is single-sourced.
